title: Harin summoned to CID tomorrow
paragraphs: SJB MP Harin Fernando has been asked to be present at the CID tomorrow to record a statement on the information he had come out with regard to the Easter Sunday attacks in Parliament earlier.
Mr. Fernando told the Daily Mirror that he had been asked to report to the CID at 10 a.m. tomorrow.

" I was asked to come to the CID. They can only record a statement from me as per the Court Order. It was notified to Court that I will be arrested only after September 1, this year and they cannot arrest me until then," he said.

MP Fernando told Parliament in April this year that former Criminal Investigations Department Director Shani Abeysekara had unearthed links between an Intelligence Officer and the 2019 Easter Sunday attacks. He said that the particular Intelligence Officer had visited the lodge of the suicide bomber who blew himself up in Dehiwala.(Yohan Perera)
